DataElement.preferredName: Primary Caregiver Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health Problems Missing Work Day Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of the number of days of work missed by their primary caregiver because of the patient's treatment or the effects of treatment.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Primary Caregiver Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health Problems Missing Work Day
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Person's stated observation of how many days of work their primary caregiver missed from work because a patient's treatment or the effects of treatment.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Primary Caregiver Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.:The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.:The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.
The primary person in charge of the care of a patient, usually a family member or a designated health care professional.

Concepts.longName: Work Productivity and Activity Impairment General Health V2.0 Questionnaire
Concepts.definition: The second version of a standardized survey originally developed by Margaret C. Reilly in 1993 which is used to evaluate the extent to which a patient's general health problems effects their ability to work and perform daily activities. This instrument consists of 6 questions which can be completed by the patient or in an interview format.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not existing; not able to be found.:The principal activity that a person does to earn money.:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

Concepts.definition: Not existing; not able to be found.
The principal activity that a person does to earn money.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The quantity of the specified item.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: Determining the number or amount of something.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/11/17 tt transferred context, added reg status and CSI per Round 5 finalization task.

ReferenceDocuments.name: If yes, how many days did you
ReferenceDocuments.description: If yes, how many days did your primary caregiver miss due to your treatment or the effects of your treatment during this time period.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI NRG clinical trial 9.18.2015.dmr
